author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two men were killed in separate accidents on Chennai Bypass Road in Maduravoyal on Monday morning.

Both were hit-and-run cases, police said.

The vehicles at fault are yet to be traced.

D. Ranjith (23), traffic investigation police said, was killed early on Monday morning when he was hit by a lorry.

Body found

In another incident, the body of a man was found by passersby on the same road in Maduravoyal. The police official said the victim is yet to be identified, but confirmed that the death occurred due to an accident. The victim is around 45 years old, police said. Both bodies have been sent to Government Kilpauk Medical College Hospital for post-mortem.
title: 2 killed in separate road accidents
